about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are at your service with our expert team in construction machinery and plants
about.companyText1: As Ishak Pasha Tokat Project, we are a leading position in the industry with over 15 years of experience in construction machinery, concrete and asphalt plants. We provide quality products and professional services by prioritizing customer satisfaction.
about.companyText2: We manufacture using modern technology and high-quality materials. All our products are designed and manufactured in accordance with international standards. We document our quality assurance with our ISO 9001 quality management system certificate.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be one of the leading manufacturers in Turkey and the world in the construction machinery sector, to provide the best service to our customers by keeping up with constantly evolving technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To contribute to the successful completion of their projects by providing quality, reliable and economical solutions to our customers. To develop environmentally friendly products with a sustainable production approach.
